height="30" width="175" x="890" y="1360" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="jDXb-mP7f66O91SVJFaH-71" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=top;rounded=0;fontSize=14;" value="<div style="line-height: 160%;">import { loadFilesSync} &nbsp; from '@graphql-tools/load-files';<div>import { mergeTypeDefs } from '@graphql-tools/merge';</div><div>import path from "path";</div><div><br></div><div>//スキーマファイルの読み込み</div><div>const schema = loadFileSync({</div><div><span style="white-space: pre;">	path.join(import.meta.dirname, "./schema/**/*.gql")</span><br></div><div>});</div><div><br></div><div>//読み込んだスキーマをマージ</div><div>const typeDefs = mergeTypeDefs(schema);</div><div><br></div><div>//以降は省略</div></div>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="290" width="371" x="940" y="944" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="jDXb-mP7f66O91SVJFaH-72" 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	"scripts": {</span><br></div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	<b style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">"build": </b><b style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">"tsc &amp;&amp;</b><b style="color: rgb(255, 0, 0);"> cp -r src/schema dist/schema</b><b style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">",</b></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	"start": "npm run build &amp;&amp; node ./dist/src/index.js",</span><br></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 160%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	"codegen": "graphql-codegen"</span><br></span></span></span></div><div style="line-height:
